    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initializes stageManager Checks the current volume state

      • register

        public void register()
        Registers a new user if the user input meets the requirements If all fields have input, asks the controller to pass on the information to validation and informs the user if the registration was successful or not. If not, tells more specific information
